entry.title: Cory Booker: Kamala Harris not worried about Trump's criticism

media:group.media:title: Cory Booker: Kamala Harris not worried about Trump's criticism
media:group.media:description: Sen. Cory Booker (D-NJ) speaks with CNN's Anderson Cooper about his fellow senator, Kamala Harris (D-CA), being selected as Joe Biden's running mate, saying that Harris has joined "the pantheon of great Black women in history." #CNN #News

entry.title: Dr. Sanjay Gupta shares his concerns on Russia Covid-19 vaccine

media:group.media:title: Dr. Sanjay Gupta shares his concerns on Russia Covid-19 vaccine
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Anderson Cooper and Dr. Sanjay Gupta discuss their interview with Russia Direct Investment Fund CEO Kirill Dmitriev following Russian President Vladimir Putin's announcement about the approval of a coronavirus vaccine amid unanswered questions over its safety.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Trump says he was surprised Biden picked Kamala Harris as running mate

media:group.media:title: Trump says he was surprised Biden picked Kamala Harris as running mate
media:group.media:description:
President Donald Trump called Sen. Kamala Harris (D-CA) his "number one draft pick" after presumptive Democratic presidential candidate Joe Biden named her as his running mate.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Watch SE Cupp's reaction to Biden's VP pick.

media:group.media:title: Watch SE Cupp's reaction to Biden's VP pick.
media:group.media:description:
After months of speculation, presumptive Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden revealed that Sen. Kamala Harris (D-CA) will be his running mate. CNN's SE Cupp analyzes the decision.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Big Ten conference won't play football this fall

media:group.media:title: Big Ten conference won't play football this fall
media:group.media:description: The Big Ten conference has voted to postpone college football and all other fall sports seasons as a result of the ongoing Covid-19 global pandemic, a development that may signal the beginning of the end for all sports at the collegiate level in 2020. #CNN #News

entry.title: Who is Kamala Harris? A look at her background and career in politics

media:group.media:title: Who is Kamala Harris? A look at her background and career in politics
media:group.media:description: The people she grew up with and worked with say Kamala Harris has always been a fighter. Joe Biden is counting on it. #CNN #News

entry.title: Borger: Kamala Harris a transformative pick for America

media:group.media:title: Borger: Kamala Harris a transformative pick for America
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Gloria Borger and David Chalian say that presumptive Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden's decision to pick Sen. Kamala Harris (D-CA) as his Vice President is more than just a historic pick. They say it signals that Biden is transforming the Democratic party to a younger generation.
#Kamal #Biden #CNN #News

entry.title: Joe Biden picks Kamala Harris as running mate

media:group.media:title: Joe Biden picks Kamala Harris as running mate
media:group.media:description: Democratic presidential candidate Joe Biden has named Kamala Harris as his running mate, making the California senator the first Black and South Asian American woman to run on a major political party's presidential ticket. #CNN #News

entry.title: Expert warns children may drive coronavirus like they drive colds

media:group.media:title: Expert warns children may drive coronavirus like they drive colds
media:group.media:description: CNN's John King discusses coronavirus, a vaccine, and children spreading the virus with Dr. Rochelle Wolenski and Dr. Nathaniel Beers. #CNN #News

entry.title: Putin says Russia has approved 'world first' Covid-19 vaccine

media:group.media:title: Putin says Russia has approved 'world first' Covid-19 vaccine
media:group.media:description: Russian President Vladimir Putin announced the approval of a coronavirus vaccine for use on Tuesday, claiming it as a "world first," amid continued concern and unanswered questions over its safety and effectiveness. #CNNI #News

entry.title: Donald Trump *actually* wants his face added to Mount Rushmore

media:group.media:title: Donald Trump *actually* wants his face added to Mount Rushmore
media:group.media:description:
President Donald Trump spoke with South Dakota Gov. Kristi Noem about the possibility of adding his face to the iconic Mount Rushmore. Chris Cillizza explains why it makes perfect sense he’d want to be memorialized this way.
SOURCES AND FURTHER READING: Yes, of course Donald Trump wants his face added to Mount Rushmore https://www.cnn.com/2020/08/10/politics/donald-trump-mt-rushmore-kristi-noem/index.html
How Kristi Noem, Mt. Rushmore and Trump Fueled Speculation About Pence’s Job https://www.nytimes.com/2020/08/08/us/politics/kristi-noem-pence-trump.html?referringSource=articleShare
Mount Trumpmore? It's the president's 'dream,' Rep. Kristi Noem says https://www.argusleader.com/story/news/2018/04/24/president-donald-trump-mount-rushmore-trumpmore/544597002/
‘I don’t kid’: Trump says he wasn’t joking about slowing coronavirus testing https://www.politico.com/news/2020/06/23/trump-joking-slowing-coronavirus-testing-335459
The White House reportedly asked South Dakota's governor how to add another president to Mount Rushmore, and she later gave Trump a 4-foot replica with his face on it https://www.businessinsider.com/how-gov-noem-trumps-desire-carved-into-mt-rushmore-2020-8
About me: I was named "best dressed" in 7th grade. That, along with being CNN's editor at large and author of the daily "Point" newsletter are my proudest achievements. Look for me here every Tuesday and Thursday to find out what’s really going down in politics.
CREDITS Writer: Chris Cillizza The Point team: Leigh Munsil and Allison Gordon Editor: Michelle Cho Producer: Arielle Sacks
Follow Chris on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cillizzac/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/cillizzacnn Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/chris.cillizza/ Subscribe to The Point newsletter: https://www.cnn.com/specials/politics/the-point-with-chris-cillizza?source=Point_Youtube.
#CNN #Cillizza #MountRushmore

entry.title: He thought Covid-19 was like the flu. Later, his organs failed

media:group.media:title: He thought Covid-19 was like the flu. Later, his organs failed
media:group.media:description: 21-year-old Spencer Rollyson had a mild case of Covid-19 but ended up in the intensive care unit with organ failure. He tells CNN's Erin Burnett that he initially thought coronavirus was like the flu. #Covid #CNN #News

entry.title: Donald Trump abruptly pauses press briefing after shooting near White House

media:group.media:title: Donald Trump abruptly pauses press briefing after shooting near White House
media:group.media:description: Shortly after a White House press briefing started, President Donald Trump was removed from the briefing room and later returned reporting a shooting outside of the White House. #CNN #News

entry.title: College football star who got Covid-19 wants season to start

media:group.media:title: College football star who got Covid-19 wants season to start
media:group.media:description:
Florida State University senior offensive lineman Andrew Boselli and 7 of his family members got infected with coronavirus. Boselli tells CNN's Brianna Keilar he thinks the 2020 college football season should start as scheduled.
#CollegeFootball #CNN #News

entry.title: Lebanon's government steps down in wake of Beirut blast

media:group.media:title: Lebanon's government steps down in wake of Beirut blast
media:group.media:description:
Lebanon's government stepped down on Monday night, less than a week after a massive explosion in Beirut killed more than 160 people and sparked days of violent protests.
Prime Minister Hassan Diab addressed the nation, announcing his resignation and that of his government in the wake of the blast, which he called a "disaster beyond measure."
In an impassioned speech, Diab berated Lebanon's ruling political elite for fostering what he called "an apparatus of corruption bigger than the state." #CNNI #News
